overview:
## Discussion

CarPlay calls this method whenever the user pans the template’s map and its visible region changes. In response, re-evaluate which points of interest are relevant to the new region and, if necessary, call [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPPointOfInterestTemplate/setPointsOfInterest(_:selectedIndex:)] to update the template.

# pointOfInterestTemplate(_:didChangeMapRegion:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate about changes to the visible region of the template’s map.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func pointOfInterestTemplate(_ pointOfInterestTemplate: CPPointOfInterestTemplate, didChangeMapRegion region: MKCoordinateRegion)
```

## Parameters

- **region**: The map’s new visible region.

## Discussion

CarPlay calls this method whenever the user pans the template’s map and its visible region changes. In response, re-evaluate which points of interest are relevant to the new region and, if necessary, call [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPPointOfInterestTemplate/setPointsOfInterest(_:selectedIndex:)] to update the template.
title: pointOfInterestTemplate(_:didChangeMapRegion:)
